channel.title: Xp per hit?
channel.description: How can i change the xp per hiting monster , atm if i hit 1 i gain 8 xp , i want it higher , i've looked a lot , can't find it anywhere and dont want to make ppl train on dummies.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 05:45:11 AM[/size][hr]PLZ help i really need.... :([br][size=1]Posted on: June 28, 2007, 06:35:41 AM[/size][hr]OMG i really need it , i can at last finish my server than.... awwww
